org.apache.lenya.cms.ac2
Class Credential

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.apache.lenya.cms.ac2.Credential
public class Credential
extends java.lang.Object

A credential assigns a set of Roles to an Accreditable.

Author:
Andreas Hartmann
